item.content:
CipherOS is an Android Custom OS, based on AOSP, striving to provide its users a clean, bloat free & sturdy experience with minimal customisations…

ROM Version: 3.8
Device: Realme C2 (RMX1941)
Maintainer: P-Salik
Build Status: Official

  • Your warranty is now void.
  • We are not responsible for anything that may happen to your phone by installing any custom ROMs and/or kernels.
  • You do it at your own risk and take the responsibility upon yourself and you are not to blame us or XDA and its respected developers.

This is a user-friendly thread, all your suggestions are important to us and will be taken into consideration..

CLEAN FLASH/First Time Installation :

  1. Download the latest build (Only vanilla build available)
  2. First Make sure recovery is installed.
  3. Reboot to recovery
  4. Make nandroid backup (Not Necessary, but just in case if you lost somewhere)
  5. Perform Factory Reset/Format
  6. Wipe system and vendor
  7. Flash latest build
  8. Wipe para ((o avoid recovery loop)
  9. Reboot to System

DIRTY FLASH :

  1. Download the latest build
  2. Reboot to recovery
  3. Flash the latest build
  4. Wipe Cache
  5. Reboot

*Note: GApps only has to be flashed once whereas Magisk/Su is to be flashed every time you Dirty Flash the OTA Update.

Download: Vanilla
Complete Changelogs: Here!
Contributors: P-Salik
Source Code: https://github.com/CipherOS
ROM OS Version: 12.1 Android Sv2

Version Information :

Status: STABLE
Current Stable Version: v3.8
Stable Release Date: 21-06-2022
